tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_injuries (
    player_id INT,
    injury_details STRING,
    injury_date DATE,
    recovery_progress STRING
)

CREATE TABLE injuries (
  injury_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  injury_details TEXT,
  injury_date DATE,
  recovery_progress TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE players (
  player_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name TEXT,
  team_id INT,
  position TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE teams (
  team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE player_details (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  injury_type VARCHAR(100),
  injury_date DATE,
  recovery_progress VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE injury_details (
  injury_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  injury_description TEXT,
  treatment_method VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_start_date DATE,
  treatment_end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_details(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recovery_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  injury_id INT,
  log_date DATE,
  log_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (injury_id) REFERENCES injury_details(injury_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recovery_progress (
  progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  injury_id INT,
  progress_date DATE,
  progress_status VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (injury_id) REFERENCES injury_details(injury_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_injuries (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  injury_date DATE,
  injury_details TEXT,
  recovery_progress TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE players (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name TEXT,
  team_id INT,
  position TEXT,
  date_of_birth DATE
)

CREATE TABLE teams (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name TEXT,
  coach_name TEXT,
  founded_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE recovery_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  injury_id INT,
  recovery_date DATE,
  recovery_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE coaches (
  coach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  coach_name TEXT,
  years_coaching INT
)
